name: We Blog the World
tag_list: events, festivals, travel, culture, blog, travel-blog, culture-blog, cultural, global-voices, untold-stories, storytelling, global-blog, world-blog, around-the-world, traveling, travelers
description: the global voice for travel & events
overview:
We Blog the World is an online travel and culture magazine focused on unique experiences and events for the savvy, discerning traveler. Topics include arts, entertainment, food/wine, style, music and culture, sustainability and more. We also review lodging, hotels, spas and retreats as well as useful products for the frequent traveler.

Our LIFE section covers people who have started unique initiatives or are doing things that make the world a better place. GREEN includes stories on people, places and things that subscribe to making the planet more sustainable and our WOMEN section covers women from around the world who are making a difference.

Follow us over on Twitter @weblogtheworld and Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/weblogtheworld
